optimization.stochastic.algorithms

Class PPPSO

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimization.stochastic.algorithms.PPPSO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptimizationAlgorithmInterface

    public class PPPSO
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizationAlgorithmInterface
    This class implements the standard predator-prey particle swarm optimization method. The methods are only applicable to float search spaces.

        populationContext - DataSet representing the data context with feature definitions.
        fe - FitnessEvaluator for solution fitness evaluation.
